mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT c.COURSE_NUMBER, a.MEMBER_NUMBER, a.COURSE_MEMBER_APPLY_DATE , e.EXPERT_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_NUMBER AS EXPERT_MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_NAME AS EXPERT_NAME, c.COURSE_TITLE FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_course_member_applicant WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}) a JOIN tbl_course c ON a.COURSE_NUMBER = c.COURSE_NUMBER LEFT JOIN tbl_expert e ON e.EXPERT_NUMBER = c.EXPERT_NUMBER LEFT JOIN tbl_member m ON e.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY a.COURSE_MEMBER_APPLY_DATE DESC ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
